trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound"> </xref> hendelser i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The MenuEventArgs class is used to store the event data passed to an event handler for the events in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MenuEventArgs brukes til å lagre Hendelsesdata som er sendt til en hendelsesbehandling for hendelser i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>|Occurs when a menu item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>| Forekommer når et menyelement klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to synchronize a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control with another control on the page.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound>|Occurs when a menu item is bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes vanligvis til å synkronisere en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>kontroll med en annen kontroll på siden. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound>| Oppstår når et menyelement er bundet til data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to modify a menu item before it is rendered in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.| Depending on the event raised, you can access the menu item clicked by the user or the menu item being bound to data by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes vanligvis til å endre et menyelement før den vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>-kontroll. | Avhengig av hendelsen som opprettes, får du tilgang til menyelementet klikkes av brukeren eller menyelementet er bundet til data ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the MenuEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen MenuEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified menu item.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av det angitte menyelementet.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs> class from the specified menu item.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>klassen fra det angitte menyelementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A>|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object specified by the `item` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| <xref:System.String.Empty>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A>| Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>objektet som er angitt av den `item` parameteren. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick"></xref> event, this parameter represents the menu item clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick"> </xref> hendelsen parameteren representerer menyelementet klikkes av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound"></xref> event, this parameter represents the menu item being bound to data.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound"> </xref> hendelsen parameteren representerer menyelementet er bundet til data.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified menu item, command source, and event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte menyelementet Kommandokilde og hendelsen argumenter.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs> class from the specified menu item, command source, and event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>klassen fra den angitte menyelementet Kommandokilde og hendelsen argumenter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the `originalArgs.CommandArgument` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the `originalArgs.CommandName` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The <xref:System.Object> specified by the `commandSource` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A>|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object specified by the `item` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| Verdien for den `originalArgs.CommandArgument` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| Verdien for den `originalArgs.CommandName` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| <xref:System.Object>Angitt av den `commandSource` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A>| Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>objektet som er angitt av den `item` parameteren. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick"></xref> event, this parameter represents the menu item clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick"> </xref> hendelsen parameteren representerer menyelementet klikkes av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound"></xref> event, this parameter represents the menu item being bound to data.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound"> </xref> hendelsen parameteren representerer menyelementet er bundet til data.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>som hendelsen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains the command name and command argument values for the menu item.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder kommandonavnet og kommandoen argumentverdier for menyelementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Object>som hendelsen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to access the <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CommandSource-egenskapen for å få tilgang til den <xref:System.Object>som hendelsen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>som hendelsen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the menu item associated with the event raised.
trans-unit.target: Henter menyelementet som er forbundet med hendelsen som opprettes.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item property to access or modify the properties of the menu item associated with the event raised.
trans-unit.target: Bruk elementegenskapen til å få tilgang til eller endre egenskapene for menyelementet som er forbundet med hendelsen som opprettes.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick> event, this item represents the menu item clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>hendelsen elementet representerer menyelementet klikkes av brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound> event, this item represents the menu item being bound to data.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound>hendelsen elementet representerer menyelementet er bundet til data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> that represents the menu item associated with the event raised.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"> </xref> som representerer menyelementet som er forbundet med hendelsen som opprettes.
